Operation 'gmailpostmastertools.domains.list' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context, poor_ai_interpretability. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about authentication requirements, return type (Domain resources), and pagination context. Added explicit mention of authentication, response schema type, and clarified the non-deterministic ordering behavior for better AI agent understanding of when to use this operation and what to expect.

data.current_description: Lists the domains that have been registered by the client. The order of domains in the response is unspecified and non-deterministic. Newly created domains will not necessarily be added to the end of this list.
data.summary_suggestion: List registered domains for authenticated client
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all domains registered by the authenticated client in the Postmaster Tools API. Returns a list of Domain resources with their associated metadata. Note: The response order is unspecified and non-deterministic; newly created domains may not appear at the end of the list. Requires authentication via OAuth 2.0.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about authentication requirements, return type (Domain resources), and pagination context. Added explicit mention of authentication, response schema type, and clarified the non-deterministic ordering behavior for better AI agent understanding of when to use this operation and what to expect.

message: Operation 'gmailpostmastertools.domains.trafficStats.get' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Missing summary. Description lacks specificity about required inputs (domain name, date), return type (TrafficStats object), and what metrics are included. Added explicit parameter requirements, return schema type, and clarified the permission error condition to improve AI agent interpretability of when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Get traffic statistics for a domain on a specific date. Returns PERMISSION_DENIED if user does not have permission to access TrafficStats for the domain.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve traffic statistics for specific date
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves email traffic statistics (TrafficStats) for a specified domain on a particular date. Requires the domain resource name and date as inputs. Returns a TrafficStats object containing metrics such as spam reports, delivery errors, and IP reputation data for that date. Returns PERMISSION_DENIED error if the authenticated user lacks access to TrafficStats for the specified domain.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks specificity about required inputs (domain name, date), return type (TrafficStats object), and what metrics are included. Added explicit parameter requirements, return schema type, and clarified the permission error condition to improve AI agent interpretability of when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'gmailpostmastertools.domains.trafficStats.list' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context, poor_ai_interpretability. Missing summary. Description lacks critical details about pagination support (9 parameters suggest filtering/pagination options), required inputs (domain name), return type (ListTrafficStatsResponse), and what metrics are included. Added explicit mention of pagination, filtering capabilities, return schema type, and clarified the permission error to help AI agents understand how to construct queries and handle responses.

data.current_description: List traffic statistics for all available days. Returns PERMISSION_DENIED if user does not have permission to access TrafficStats for the domain.
data.summary_suggestion: List traffic statistics across available dates
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of email traffic statistics (TrafficStats) for a specified domain across all available days. Requires the domain resource name as input and supports filtering and pagination parameters. Returns a ListTrafficStatsResponse containing TrafficStats objects with metrics including spam reports, delivery errors, and IP reputation data for each date. Returns PERMISSION_DENIED error if the authenticated user lacks access to TrafficStats for the specified domain. Supports date range filtering and result pagination.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks critical details about pagination support (9 parameters suggest filtering/pagination options), required inputs (domain name), return type (ListTrafficStatsResponse), and what metrics are included. Added explicit mention of pagination, filtering capabilities, return schema type, and clarified the permission error to help AI agents understand how to construct queries and handle responses.
